summary:
This mod fixes eyes glitch with invisibility effect and through water surface.
Supports all vanilla races.
descriptionHtml:
This mod fixes eyes glitch with invisibility effect and through water surface.
Supports all vanilla races.


Specifically, overwrites following nif files.

meshes/actors/character/character assets/
eyesargonian.nif
eyeschild.nif
eyesfemale.nif
eyesfemalevampire.nif
eyeskhajiit.nif
eyeskhajiitfemale.nif
eyesmale.nif
eyesmalevampire.nif

meshes/actors/character/character assets/faceparts/
eyesmaleleft.nif
eyesmaleright.nif


There is no convertibility with mod including these files.


------------------------------------------------------------------------------
以下、日本語(The following sentences are Japanese.)

Nifskopeでメッシュを読み込んでShaderFlags１の
SLSF1_Eye_Environment_Mappingのチェックをはずして
SLSF1_Environment_Mappingと
SLSF1_Decalにチェックを入れただけです。

詳しくはよくわかりませんが、これで透明化後及び水面越しの目がつぶれる現象はなくなります。。
author: bellwood2206
